mn66:5.20: kaṇṭakāvāṭampi → kaṇṭakavaṭṭampi (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); kaṇikavāṭampi (si, mr); kaṇṭakarājimpi (sya-all, km)
mn66:5.28: Bhikkhussa ātumārī, bhikkhussa mātumārī → ṭhitoti. bhikkhussa ātu māri bhikkhussa mātu māri (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed); ṭhito’ti. bhikkhussa ātumātumārī (mr)
mn66:5.29: na tveva varaṃ yaṃ → na tveva yā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); na tveva yaṃ (sya-all) | carasī’ti → carasāti (si, pts-vp-pli1ed)
